Introduction
This topic contains information on duty status and eligibility for benefits for current or former members of the Reserves, including
eligibility of reservists for compensation and pension
reserve service programs that constitute active duty
, and
qualifying Coast Guard Reserve service under 14 U.S.C
.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section A - Establishing Veteran Status
citation: Part III, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section A
